posts.post_content:
Hi,

I am selling a group of 38 T206 cards and 1 T205 card for a friend of mine who is not that good with technology. The cards are mainly in the VG to VGEX range. The backs are problem free. A small number have slight stains, but no real problems at all.

The price of the cards is $1125, which includes insured delivery. You will be happy with these cards.

You can pay with PayPal or US Postal money order.

You can contact me through the board or directly at [url]cy@cyscards.com[/url]

Here are the links to view the cards.

[IMG]http://www.cyscards.com/prewar/picsb/t206lot1b.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.cyscards.com/prewar/picsb/t206lot2b.jpg[/IMG]

Thanks.

Cy
